name: Love Is Respect
description: 24/7 peer support for young people navigating relationships
fullDescription: Love Is Respect provides support for young people ages 13-26 navigating relationships, offering a 24/7 helpline, text support, and online chat with trained peer advocates.
whatTheyOffer:
- 24/7 phone support
- Text support (text LOVEIS to 22522)
- Online chat
- Peer advocates aged 18-26
- Relationship education
- Safety planning
- Local resource referrals
- Support for all genders
howToGetIt:
1. Call: 1-866-331-9474
2. Text LOVEIS to 22522
3. Chat online at loveisrespect.org
4. Peer advocates available 24/7
5. Confidential and judgment-free
6. No question too small
keywords: Love Is Respect, youth, young people, ages 13-26, peer advocates, relationship help, text LOVEIS 22522, 1-866-331-9474, online chat, safety planning
